welcome.alreadyrunning: The One-Click Miner is already running. You can't run it more than once.
welcome.click_button_to_start: Click the button below to start mining again.
welcome.makeapassword: Make an OCM Wallet password. Don't lose it.
welcome.error_initializing: Something went wrong initializing the wallet

checks.prerequisite: A prerequisite is being installed. You might see a popup asking for permissions (could just be blinking in the taskbar)

mining.pending_payout_info_unavailable: Please wait for pending payout information

sending.send_all_to: Send all your mined coins to
sending.sign_failed: Unable to sign transaction. Check password.
sending.send_failed: Unable to send transaction. Check debug.log for more information

settings.enable_debug_sub: Include the miner's console output in the debug log. Can grow your logs quite large
settings.auto_start_sub: Start the One-Click Miner when you log in your computer
settings.closed_source_sub: Better hashrate, but unaudited miners that incur a developer's fee
settings.closed_source_warning: You have selected to use closed source miner(s). Vertcoin does not endorse or support these miners. They cannot be audited on their contents and could contain functions that harm your computer.
settings.enable_integrated_sub: The miner will use onboard graphics (if possible)
settings.testnet_sub: Enables testnet mode. You will not be mining real coins.
settings.skipverthashverify_sub: Will skip verifying the file integrity of Verthash data on startup (not recommended)

tracking.tracking_enabled: You are anonymously sharing usage statistics
tracking.tracking_disabled: You are not sharing usage statistics
tracking.enable_tracking: Enable these to help us improve your experience
